code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a f aged 71 yrs presents with 2 years history of mild problem with seeing at night, mild deterioration of eye sight and Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol Patient does not smoke o:Height 173 cm, Weight 44.2 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 16 a:Glaucoma p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed timolol 0.25% - 1 drp one drop affected eye 2 x day, and ordered Visual Field Testing.

s:patient complained of mild problem with seeing at night and mild deterioration of eye sight. patient denied any fall or trauma. NKDA. patient is a female retired aged 72 years. she denies ever using cigarettes Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol o:Height 172 cm, Weight 43.7 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15 a:Glaucoma p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed timolol 0.25% - 1 drp one drop affected eye 2 x day, and ordered Visual Field Testing.
